subTitle: Come with me and learn a little about me.
textAboutMe: Hello! my name is Angelo Mateo Bessolo Rueda, I work as a software developer. I am passionate about continuous learning and technology, since I was young I have always been curious about issues facing the future and advancement of humanity such as programming, automation, space exploration, among others. I have great skills that make me stand out as teamwork, leadership, critical stance, punctuality, compliance. Always with the desire to give the maximum in any challenge I face.
Durante mi trayectoria en la empresa, pa: During my time at the company, I actively participated in the analysis, development, support, and implementation of new functionalities for the corporate system, optimizing its use and ensuring its effectiveness for our clients.
Desempeñé mis funciones siguiendo la met: I performed my tasks following the Scrum agile methodology, collaborating in the continuous delivery of product improvements and updates. My work included using advanced tools like Db2 for database management and administration, as well as development in the COBOL environment on AS/400, covering formats like CBL, CBLLE, SQLCBLLE, CL, and SDA.
Adquirí sólidos conocimientos en program: I acquired solid COBOL programming skills in three months, which allowed me to quickly integrate into the team and contribute effectively to the assigned projects.
Logré abstraer del core bancario, junto: I managed to abstract key banking knowledge and logic from the core system, along with architects, consolidating my understanding of the business.
Análisis, desarrollo, soporte e implemen: Analysis, development, support, and implementation of features for the company's main application, ORFEO NG.
Mantenimiento y resolución de issues en: Maintenance and resolution of issues in the software.
Gestión de control y versionamiento de c: Management of code control and versioning through GitLab.
Actualización y despliegue de cambios en: Updating and deploying changes in production on the client's servers.
Me capacité de manera continua en tecnol: I continuously trained in technologies like Angular, applying the knowledge gained independently and learning new concepts with the support of the company's engineers.
Desarrollé una funcionalidad para un cli: I developed a feature for a client, using technologies like Yii2 and PHP for routing, creating views, and integrating with MySQL databases.
